Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden won't do any more in-person campaigning for the remaining 9 days before the election, when in reality he has plans to visit several states before November 3rd.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden has plans to visit several states in the final days of the campaign.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by not providing accurate information about Joe Biden's campaign plans.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on false information and misinformation spread on social media.
Problematic assumption: There is no evidence of a problematic assumption in the claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that Joe Biden has not stopped all in-person campaigning and has plans to visit multiple states before the election.
